name: Unicredit - Avoid Use of Hard-coded Credentials (CWE-798)
description:
This metric detects the usage of hard-coded password stored in variables or used by the following methods:
TBC
output:
List all objects (Java, Jsp, Javascript, VBScript) that could contain hard coded passwords
It provides the following information:
 - Object full name
rationale:
Hard-coded credentials typically create a significant hole that allows an attacker to bypass the authentication that has been configured by the software administrator. 
This hole might be difficult for the system administrator to detect. Even if detected, it can be difficult to fix, so the administrator may be forced into disabling the product entirely.
total:

X and Y are parameters and can be modified
